ingredients.ingredient: 6 bamboo skewers, soaked in water for 20 minutes
1 pound medium shrimp, peeled and deveined

cookingTips: Soak bamboo skewers at least 20 minutes to prevent burning on the grill
Watch shrimp carefully as they cook quickly; remove when just opaque to avoid rubbery texture
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What's the optimal grill temperature and timing for shrimp to avoid overcooking?
